Metric Base Class¶

class src.metric.MetricController(deviance_value: float)¶

Base class for controllers. Handles receiving data from hardware modules and analysing them for spikes in values.

Parameters

deviance_value – Minimum value that would count for a change

check_deviance(new_value: float) → bool¶

Compares a new value to the average of the previous values.

If there is a notable deviance (Above self.deviance_value)

Parameters

new_value – The new value to check

measure() → src.metric.MetricRecord¶

Reads a new data point from the component and returns it paird with metadata about the record

measure_value() → float¶

Reads a new value from the component

class src.metric.MetricRecord(time: datetime.datetime, value: float, is_deviant: bool = False)¶

Class that holds the information about a single point of data from a component
